p:
To test the relationship between observed abundance of B. tabaci (field counts) and modelled climate suitability for B. tabaci MEAM1 throughout the same period as the dataset of Alicai, et al.
71 we firstly aggregated the field counts to the grid of 121 climate cells covering Uganda used for the CLIMEX modelling. A linear mixed effects model fit by REML was used to model the relationship between modelled EI values in each cell and log (count + 1) for B. tabaci in cassava fields and to check for consistency in this relationship through time.
